title: Enhancing Healthcare Practical Competencies: Mathematics Achievement Using Metacognitive Strategies in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can systematically apply metacognitive strategies (planning-monitoring-evaluation) in blended learning environments to self-regulate mathematical problem-solving processes.
Learners can enhance practical application skills of mathematical concepts by integrating online activities (video lectures, quizzes) and offline workshops (case analysis, group discussions).
Learners can improve self-directed learning outcomes by over 20% while writing metacognitive reflection journals through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
